EmailTemplate.subject: DR/MX Summer Interns 2014 - Deadline Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey Applicants!!!
I just wanted to let everyone know that I will be away starting tomorrow and won't be returning to my emails or the office until next Tuesday, December 3rd. If you have any questions please let me know and I will extend the date until December 3rd so that you can have more time to complete the following steps:
1) Send in your Consent Forms (scan and email it to me):
http://livedifferent.com/sites/default/files/pdf/consentform-1.pdfhttp://livedifferent.com/content/internship
2) Fill out our application survey:
https://docs.google.com/a/absoluteontheweb.com/spreadsheet/viewform?formkey=dGtpYlVhb0hFRkF4VG9VUm1rcjFwcWc6MQ#gid=0
3) Write a short essay about yourself and why you would be a great fit for our internship program using the following criteria:
Maximum: 1 Page Single-spaced Font size: 12 Font style: Times New Roman Include: First and Last Name at the top of the page Please send me an e-mail with a word document attached to it.
** You must complete all 3 steps before your application will be processed. **
Photos and Videos:
Here are some photos and videos from our past Live Different Build trips if you would like to use them for your fundraising needs: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/3wke2n7mm37rg7e/E0VsZOT3q8
Please let me know if you have any questions while filling out the online registration, the application form, or when writing your short essay.
Sincerely,
Joy Yu
